game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Explore the ancient ruins and retrieve the legendary Eldarathian Sceptre
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep within the nearby forest, said to contain treasures beyond imagination. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the ruins, overcome treacherous obstacles, and retrieve the fabled Eldarathian Sceptre.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, +20 reputation with the local guild

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the ancient ruins
task.description: Make your way through the forest and locate the hidden entrance to the Lost City of Eldarath. Be cautious, as the journey is said to be treacherous.

task.objective: Retrieve a ancient scroll from the city's library
task.description: Navigate through the ruins and find the city's library, where an ancient scroll holds vital information about the location of the Eldarathian Sceptre.
task.location: The Lost City of Eldarath, coordinates (21.11, 45.67)

task.objective: Defeat the guardian and retrieve the Eldarathian Sceptre
task.description: Face your greatest challenge yet as you confront the fearsome guardian of the sceptre. Claim victory, and the treasure shall be yours.
task.location: The Heart of the Ruins, coordinates (11.34, 23.56)
